cnd23:148.3: Idhekacco puggalo kuhanāya lapanāya nemittikatāya nippesikatāya lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsanatāya dārudānena veḷudānena pattadānena pupphadānena phaladānena sinānadānena cuṇṇadānena mattikādānena dantakaṭṭhadānena mukhodakadānena cāṭukamyatāya muggasūpyatāya pāribhaṭyatāya pīṭhamaddikatāya vatthuvijjāya tiracchānavijjāya aṅgavijjāya nakkhattavijjāya dūtagamanena pahiṇagamanena jaṅghapesaniyena vejjakammena navakammena piṇḍapaṭipiṇḍakena dānānuppadānena, adhammena visamena laddhā labhitvā adhigantvā vinditvā paṭilabhitvā jīvikaṃ kappeti.

cnd23:163.2: **Bhayan**ti jātibhayaṃ jarābhayaṃ byādhibhayaṃ maraṇabhayaṃ rājabhayaṃ corabhayaṃ aggibhayaṃ udakabhayaṃ attānuvādabhayaṃ parānuvādabhayaṃ daṇḍabhayaṃ duggatibhayaṃ ūmibhayaṃ kumbhilabhayaṃ āvaṭṭabhayaṃ susumārabhayaṃ ājīvikabhayaṃ asilokabhayaṃ parisasārajjabhayaṃ madanabhayaṃ bhayānakaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃso cetaso ubbego utrāso.

cnd23:166.16: Yaṃ kho, bhikkhave, ime pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, idaṃ vuccati kāmasukhaṃ miḷhasukhaṃ puthujjanasukhaṃ anariyasukhaṃ, ‘na sevitabbaṃ na bhāvetabbaṃ na bahulīkātabbaṃ, bhāyitabbaṃ etassa sukhassā’ti vadāmī”ti—
cnd23:167.2: nānāvaṇṇehi phoṭṭhabbehi cittaṃ mathenti tosenti pahāsentīti—
cnd23:168.4: Idha, bhikkhave, kulaputto yena sippaṭṭhānena jīvikaṃ kappeti, yadi muddāya yadi gaṇanāya yadi saṅkhānena yadi kasiyā yadi vaṇijjāya yadi gorakkhena yadi issatthena yadi rājaporisena yadi sippaññatarena, sītassa purakkhato uṇhassa purakkhato ḍaṃsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassehi samphassamāno khuppipāsāya mīyamāno;
cnd23:168.5: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, kāmānaṃ ādīnavo sandiṭṭhiko dukkhakkhandho kāmahetu kāmanidānaṃ kāmādhikaraṇaṃ kāmānameva hetu.
cnd23:169.1: Tassa ce, bhikkhave, kulaputtassa evaṃ uṭṭhahato ghaṭato vāyamato te bhogā nābhinipphajjanti, so socati kilamati paridevati urattāḷiṃ kandati, sammohaṃ āpajjati—
cnd23:169.2: ‘moghaṃ vata me uṭṭhānaṃ, aphalo vata me vāyāmo’ti.
cnd23:169.3: Ayampi, bhikkhave, kāmānaṃ ādīnavo sandiṭṭhiko dukkhakkhandho kāmahetu kāmanidānaṃ kāmādhikaraṇaṃ kāmānameva hetu.
cnd23:170.1: Tassa ce, bhikkhave, kulaputtassa evaṃ uṭṭhahato ghaṭato vāyamato te bhogā abhinipphajjanti, so tesaṃ bhogānaṃ ārakkhādhikaraṇaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti—
cnd23:170.2: ‘kinti me bhoge neva rājāno hareyyuṃ, na corā hareyyuṃ, na aggi ḍaheyya, na udakaṃ vaheyya, na appiyā dāyādā hareyyun’ti.
cnd23:170.3: Tassa evaṃ ārakkhato gopayato te bhoge rājāno vā haranti corā vā haranti aggi vā ḍahati udakaṃ vā vahati appiyā vā dāyādā haranti.
cnd23:170.7: Ayampi, bhikkhave, kāmānaṃ ādīnavo sandiṭṭhiko dukkhakkhandho kāmahetu kāmanidānaṃ kāmādhikaraṇaṃ kāmānameva hetu.
cnd23:171.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, kāmahetu kāmanidānaṃ kāmādhikaraṇaṃ kāmānameva hetu rājānopi rājūhi vivadanti, khattiyāpi khattiyehi vivadanti, brāhmaṇāpi brāhmaṇehi vivadanti, gahapatīpi gahapatīhi vivadanti, mātāpi puttena vivadati, puttopi mātarā vivadati, pitāpi puttena vivadati, puttopi pitarā vivadati, bhātāpi bhaginiyā vivadati, bhaginīpi bhātarā vivadati, sahāyopi sahāyena vivadati.
cnd23:171.2: Te tattha kalahaviggahavivādāpannā aññamaññaṃ pāṇīhipi upakkamanti leḍḍūhipi upakkamanti daṇḍehipi upakkamanti satthehipi upakkamanti.
cnd23:171.3: Te tattha maraṇampi nigacchanti maraṇamattampi dukkhaṃ.
cnd23:171.4: Ayampi, bhikkhave, kāmānaṃ ādīnavo sandiṭṭhiko dukkhakkhandho kāmahetu kāmanidānaṃ kāmādhikaraṇaṃ kāmānameva hetu.
cnd23:172.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, kāmahetu kāmanidānaṃ kāmādhikaraṇaṃ kāmānameva hetu asicammaṃ gahetvā dhanukalāpaṃ sannayhitvā ubhatobyūḷhaṃ saṅgāmaṃ pakkhandanti, usūsupi khippamānesu sattīsupi khippamānāsu asīsupi vijjotalantesu.
cnd23:172.2: Te tattha usūhipi vijjhanti sattīhipi vijjhanti asināpi sīsaṃ chindanti.
cnd23:172.3: Te tattha maraṇampi nigacchanti maraṇamattampi dukkhaṃ.
cnd23:172.4: Ayampi, bhikkhave, kāmānaṃ ādīnavo sandiṭṭhiko dukkhakkhandho kāmahetu kāmanidānaṃ kāmādhikaraṇaṃ kāmānameva hetu.
cnd23:173.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, kāmahetu kāmanidānaṃ kāmādhikaraṇaṃ kāmānameva hetu asicammaṃ gahetvā dhanukalāpaṃ sannayhitvā addāvalepanā upakāriyo pakkhandanti, usūsupi khippamānesu sattīsupi khippamānāsu, asīsupi vijjotalantesu.
cnd23:173.2: Te tattha usūhipi vijjhanti sattīhipi vijjhanti chakaṇakāyapi osiñcanti abhivaggenapi omaddanti asināpi sīsaṃ chindanti.
cnd23:173.3: Te tattha maraṇampi nigacchanti maraṇamattampi dukkhaṃ.
cnd23:173.4: Ayampi, bhikkhave, kāmānaṃ ādīnavo sandiṭṭhiko dukkhakkhandho kāmahetu kāmanidānaṃ kāmādhikaraṇaṃ kāmānameva hetu.
cnd23:174.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, kāmahetu kāmanidānaṃ kāmādhikaraṇaṃ kāmānameva hetu sandhimpi chindanti nillopampi haranti ekāgārikampi karonti paripanthepi tiṭṭhanti paradārampi gacchanti.
cnd23:174.2: Tamenaṃ rājāno gahetvā vividhā kammakāraṇā kārenti—
cnd23:174.3: kasāhipi tāḷenti, vettehipi tāḷenti, aḍḍhadaṇḍakehipi tāḷenti, hatthampi chindanti …pe… asināpi sīsaṃ chindanti.
cnd23:174.4: Te tattha maraṇampi nigacchanti maraṇamattampi dukkhaṃ.
cnd23:174.5: Ayampi, bhikkhave, kāmānaṃ ādīnavo sandiṭṭhiko dukkhakkhandho kāmahetu kāmanidānaṃ kāmādhikaraṇaṃ kāmānameva hetu.
cnd23:175.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, kāmahetu kāmanidānaṃ kāmādhikaraṇaṃ kāmānameva hetu kāyena duccaritaṃ caranti vācāya duccaritaṃ caranti manasā duccaritaṃ caranti.
cnd23:175.2: Te kāyena duccaritaṃ caritvā vācāya duccaritaṃ caritvā manasā duccaritaṃ caritvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti.
cnd23:175.3: Ayampi, bhikkhave, kāmānaṃ ādīnavo samparāyiko dukkhakkhandho kāmahetu kāmanidānaṃ kāmādhikaraṇaṃ kāmānameva hetu”.

cnd23:179.10: Kasmā ca, bhikkhave, bhayanti kāmānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ?
cnd23:179.11: Yasmā ca kāmarāgarattāyaṃ, bhikkhave, chandarāgavinibaddho diṭṭhadhammikāpi bhayā na parimuccati, samparāyikāpi bhayā na parimuccati, tasmā bhayanti kāmānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
cnd23:179.19: Yasmā ca kāmarāgarattāyaṃ, bhikkhave, chandarāgavinibaddho diṭṭhadhammikāpi gabbhā na parimuccati, samparāyikāpi gabbhā na parimuccati, tasmā gabbhoti kāmānametaṃ adhivacanan”ti.
cnd23:183.1: Ītī ca gaṇḍo ca upaddavo ca,
cnd23:184.1: **Etaṃ bhayaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā**ti etaṃ bhayaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā passitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvāti—
cnd23:184.2: etaṃ bhayaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
cnd23:187.3: abbhantaradhātuppakopavasena vā sītaṃ hoti bahiddhā utuvasena vā sītaṃ hoti.
cnd23:187.5: abbhantaradhātuppakopavasena vā uṇhaṃ hoti bahiddhā utuvasena vā uṇhaṃ hoti.
cnd23:188.2: **Vātā**ti puratthimā vātā pacchimā vātā uttarā vātā dakkhiṇā vātā sarajā vātā arajā vātā sītā vātā uṇhā vātā parittā vātā adhimattā vātā verambhavātā pakkhavātā supaṇṇavātā tālapaṇṇavātā vidhūpanavātā.
cnd23:192.7: Kathaṃ so paccekasambuddho āguṃ na karotīti nāgo?
cnd23:192.8: Āgu vuccati pāpakā akusalā dhammā saṃkilesikā ponobhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇiyā.
cnd23:194.1: Evaṃ so paccekasambuddho āguṃ na karotīti nāgo.

cnd23:195.14: na vaggehi dhammehi yāyati nīyati vuyhati saṃharīyati.

cnd23:196.2: Sotāpattimaggena ye kilesā pahīnā te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchati,
cnd23:196.5: arahattamaggena ye kilesā pahīnā te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchati.

cnd23:197.1: **Nāgova yūthāni vivajjayitvā**ti yathā so hatthināgo yūthāni vivajjetvā parivajjetvā abhinivajjetvā ekova araññavanamajjhogāhetvā carati viharati iriyati vatteti pāleti yapeti yāpeti, paccekasambuddhopi gaṇaṃ vivajjetvā parivajjetvā abhivajjetvā eko araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevati appasaddāni appanigghosāni vijanavātāni manussarāhasseyyakāni paṭisallānasāruppāni.
cnd23:197.2: So eko gacchati eko tiṭṭhati eko nisīdati eko seyyaṃ kappeti eko gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati eko paṭikkamati eko raho nisīdati eko caṅkamaṃ adhiṭṭhāti eko carati viharati iriyati vatteti pāleti yapeti yāpetīti—
cnd23:198.1: **Sañjātakhandho padumī uḷāro**ti yathā so hatthināgo sañjātakkhandho sattaratano vā hoti aṭṭharatano vā, paccekasambuddhopi sañjātakkhandho asekkhena sīlakkhandhena asekkhena samādhikkhandhena asekkhena paññākkhandhena asekkhena vimuttikkhandhena asekkhena vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhena.
cnd23:198.2: Yathā so hatthināgo padumī, paccekasambuddhopi sattahi bojjhaṅgapupphehi padumī, satisambojjhaṅgapupphena dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgapupphena vīriyasambojjhaṅgapupphena pītisambojjhaṅgapupphena passaddhisambojjhaṅgapupphena samādhisambojjhaṅgapupphena upekkhāsambojjhaṅgapupphena.
cnd23:198.3: Yathā so hatthināgo uḷāro thāmena balena javena sūrena, paccekasambuddhopi uḷāro sīlena samādhinā paññāya vimuttiyā vimuttiñāṇadassanenāti—
cnd23:199.1: **Yathābhirantaṃ vihare araññe**ti yathā so hatthināgo yathābhirantaṃ araññe viharati, paccekasambuddhopi yathābhirantaṃ araññe viharati.
cnd23:199.16: yathābhirantaṃ vihare araññe, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
cnd23:202.1: **Aṭṭhānataṃ saṅgaṇikāratassa, yaṃ phassaye sāmayikaṃ vimuttin**ti vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā—
cnd23:202.2: “yāvatānanda, bhikkhu saṅgaṇikārāmo saṅgaṇikarato saṅgaṇikārāmataṃ anuyutto, gaṇārāmo gaṇarato gaṇasammudito gaṇārāmataṃ anuyutto, yaṃ taṃ nekkhammasukhaṃ pavivekasukhaṃ upasamasukhaṃ sambodhisukhaṃ, tassa sukhassa nikāmalābhī bhavissati akicchalābhī akasiralābhīti—
cnd23:202.4: Yo ca kho so, ānanda, bhikkhu eko gaṇasmā vūpakaṭṭho viharati, tassetaṃ bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṃ.
cnd23:202.5: Yaṃ taṃ nekkhammasukhaṃ pavivekasukhaṃ upasamasukhaṃ sambodhisukhaṃ, tassa sukhassa nikāmalābhī bhavissati akicchalābhī akasiralābhīti—
cnd23:202.7: Yāvatānanda, bhikkhu saṅgaṇikārāmo saṅgaṇikarato saṅgaṇikārāmataṃ anuyutto, gaṇārāmo gaṇarato gaṇasammudito (gaṇārāmataṃ anuyutto) sāmāyikaṃ vā kantaṃ cetovimuttiṃ upasampajja viharissati, asāmāyikaṃ vā akuppanti—
cnd23:202.9: Yo ca kho so, ānanda, bhikkhu eko gaṇasmā vūpakaṭṭho viharati, tassetaṃ bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṃ sāmāyikaṃ vā kantaṃ cetovimuttiṃ upasampajja viharissati, asāmāyikaṃ vā akuppanti, ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti—
cnd23:202.10: aṭṭhānataṃ saṅgaṇikāratassa, yaṃ phassaye sāmayikaṃ vimuttiṃ.
cnd23:203.4: So paccekasambuddho sūriyassa gottañātako gottabandhu, tasmā paccekasambuddho ādiccabandhu.
cnd23:203.5: **Ādiccabandhussa vaco nisammā**ti ādiccabandhussa vacanaṃ byappathaṃ desanaṃ anusāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhaṃ sutvā suṇitvā uggahetvā upadhārayitvā upalakkhayitvāti—
cnd23:203.6: ādiccabandhussa vaco nisamma, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
cnd23:206.2: Idha assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpaṃ attato samanupassati rūpavantaṃ vā attānaṃ attani vā rūpaṃ rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃ,
cnd23:206.6: viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassati viññāṇavantaṃ vā attānaṃ attani vā viññāṇaṃ viññāṇasmiṃ vā attānaṃ.
cnd23:206.7: Yā evarūpā diṭṭhi diṭṭhigataṃ diṭṭhigahanaṃ diṭṭhikantāro diṭṭhivisūkāyikaṃ diṭṭhivipphanditaṃ diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ gāho paṭiggāho abhiniveso parāmāso kummaggo micchāpatho micchattaṃ titthāyatanaṃ vipariyesaggāho viparītaggāho vipallāsaggāho micchāgāho, ayāthāvakasmiṃ yāthāvakanti gāho, yāvatā dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni—
cnd23:206.9: **Diṭṭhīvisūkāni upātivatto**ti diṭṭhivisūkāni upātivatto atikkanto samatikkanto vītivattoti—
cnd23:207.1: **Patto niyāmaṃ paṭiladdhamaggo**ti niyāmā vuccanti cattāro maggā;
cnd23:207.3: sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi.
cnd23:207.4: Catūhi ariyamaggehi samannāgato niyāmaṃ patto sampatto adhigato phassito sacchikatoti—
cnd23:208.1: **Uppannañāṇomhi anaññaneyyo**ti tassa paccekasambuddhassa ñāṇaṃ uppannaṃ samuppannaṃ nibbattaṃ abhinibbattaṃ pātubhūtaṃ.
cnd23:208.2: “Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti ñāṇaṃ uppannaṃ samuppannaṃ nibbattaṃ abhinibbattaṃ pātubhūtaṃ,
cnd23:208.5: “yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman”ti ñāṇaṃ uppannaṃ samuppannaṃ nibbattaṃ abhinibbattaṃ pātubhūtanti—
cnd23:208.7: **Anaññaneyyo**ti so paccekasambuddho na paraneyyo na parappattiyo na parappaccayo na parapaṭibaddhagū, yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passati asammūḷho sampajāno paṭissato.
cnd23:208.8: “Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti na paraneyyo na parappattiyo na parappaccayo na parapaṭibaddhagū, yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passati asammūḷho sampajāno paṭissato.
cnd23:208.11: “yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman”ti na paraneyyo na parappattiyo na parappaccayo na parapaṭibaddhagū, yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passati asammūḷho sampajāno paṭissatoti—
cnd23:211.2: Yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ.
cnd23:211.3: Sā loluppā taṇhā tassa paccekasambuddhassa pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
cnd23:212.2: paccayapaṭisevanasaṅkhātaṃ kuhanavatthu, iriyāpathasaṅkhātaṃ kuhanavatthu, sāmantajappanasaṅkhātaṃ kuhanavatthu.
cnd23:213.2: Idha gahapatikā bhikkhuṃ nimantenti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārehi, so pāpiccho icchāpakato atthiko cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṃ bhiyyokamyataṃ upādāya cīvaraṃ paccakkhāti, piṇḍapātaṃ paccakkhāti, senāsanaṃ paccakkhāti, gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ paccakkhāti.
cnd23:213.5: Etaṃ sāruppaṃ yaṃ samaṇo susānā vā saṅkārakūṭā vā pāpaṇikā vā nantakāni uccinitvā saṅghāṭikaṃ karitvā dhāreyya.
cnd23:213.7: Etaṃ sāruppaṃ yaṃ samaṇo uñchācariyāya piṇḍiyālopena jīvikaṃ kappeyya.
cnd23:213.9: Etaṃ sāruppaṃ yaṃ samaṇo rukkhamūliko vā assa sosāniko vā abbhokāsiko vā.
cnd23:213.11: Etaṃ sāruppaṃ yaṃ samaṇo pūtimuttena vā haritakīkhaṇḍena vā osadhaṃ kareyyā”ti.
cnd23:213.12: Tadupādāya lūkhaṃ cīvaraṃ dhāreti lūkhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjati lūkhaṃ senāsanaṃ paṭisevati lūkhaṃ gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ paṭisevati.
cnd23:213.14: “ayaṃ samaṇo appiccho santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho āraddhavīriyo dhutavādo”ti.
cnd23:213.17: “tiṇṇaṃ sammukhībhāvā saddho kulaputto bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati, saddhāya sammukhībhāvā saddho kulaputto bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati, deyyadhammassa sammukhībhāvā saddho kulaputto bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati, dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ sammukhībhāvā saddho kulaputto bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati.
cnd23:213.18: Tumhākañcevāyaṃ saddhā atthi, deyyadhammo ca saṃvijjati, ahañca paṭiggāhako.
cnd23:213.19: Sacehaṃ na paṭiggahessāmi, evaṃ tumhe puññena paribāhirā bhavissatha.
cnd23:213.22: Tadupādāya bahumpi cīvaraṃ paṭiggaṇhāti, bahumpi piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti, bahumpi senāsanaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti, bahumpi gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ paṭiggaṇhāti.
cnd23:213.23: Yā evarūpā bhākuṭikā bhākuṭiyaṃ kuhanā kuhāyanā kuhitattaṃ—
cnd23:214.2: Idhekacco pāpiccho icchāpakato sambhāvanādhippāyo “evaṃ maṃ jano sambhāvessatī”ti gamanaṃ saṇṭhapeti ṭhānaṃ saṇṭhapeti nisajjaṃ saṇṭhapeti sayanaṃ saṇṭhapeti, paṇidhāya gacchati paṇidhāya tiṭṭhati paṇidhāya nisīdati paṇidhāya seyyaṃ kappeti samāhito viya gacchati samāhito viya tiṭṭhati samāhito viya nisīdati samāhito viya seyyaṃ kappeti, āpāthakajjhāyīva hoti.
cnd23:214.3: Yā evarūpā iriyāpathassa āṭhapanā ṭhapanā saṇṭhapanā bhākuṭikā bhākuṭiyaṃ kuhanā kuhāyanā kuhitattaṃ—
cnd23:215.2: Idhekacco pāpiccho icchāpakato sambhāvanādhippāyo “evaṃ maṃ jano sambhāvessatī”ti ariyadhamme sannissitavācaṃ bhāsati.
cnd23:215.3: “Yo evarūpaṃ cīvaraṃ dhāreti so samaṇo mahesakkho”ti bhaṇati;
cnd23:215.11: āyogaṃ dhāreti so samaṇo mahesakkho”ti bhaṇati;
cnd23:215.12: “yassa evarūpo upajjhāyo so samaṇo mahesakkho”ti bhaṇati;
cnd23:215.33: rukkhamūle vasati so samaṇo mahesakkho”ti bhaṇati.
cnd23:216.1: Atha vā korajikakorajiko bhākuṭikabhākuṭiko kuhakakuhako lapakalapako mukhasambhāviko “ayaṃ samaṇo imāsaṃ evarūpānaṃ santānaṃ vihārasamāpattīnaṃ lābhī”ti tādisaṃ gambhīraṃ gūḷhaṃ nipuṇaṃ paṭicchannaṃ lokuttaraṃ suññatāpaṭisaññuttaṃ kathaṃ katheti.
cnd23:216.2: Yā evarūpā bhākuṭikā bhākuṭiyaṃ kuhanā kuhāyanā kuhitattaṃ, idaṃ sāmantajappanasaṅkhātaṃ kuhanavatthu.
cnd23:216.3: Tassa paccekasambuddhassa imāni tīṇi kuhanavatthūni pahīnāni samucchinnāni vūpasantāni paṭippassaddhāni abhabbuppattikāni ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāni.
cnd23:217.2: Yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ.
cnd23:217.3: Sā pipāsā taṇhā tassa paccekasambuddhassa pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
cnd23:218.2: **Makkho**ti yo makkho makkhāyanā makkhāyitattaṃ niṭṭhuriyaṃ niṭṭhuriyakammaṃ.
cnd23:218.3: **Kasāvo**ti rāgo kasāvo, doso kasāvo, moho kasāvo, kodho …pe… upanāho … makkho … paḷāso … sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārā kasāvā.
cnd23:218.4: **Moho**ti dukkhe aññāṇaṃ, dukkhasamudaye aññāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhe aññāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya aññāṇaṃ, pubbante aññāṇaṃ, aparante aññāṇaṃ, pubbantāparante aññāṇaṃ, idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇaṃ.
cnd23:218.5: Yaṃ evarūpaṃ aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ anabhisamayo ananubodho appaṭivedho asaṅgāhanā apariyogāhanā asamapekkhanā apaccavekkhaṇā apaccakkhakammaṃ dummejjhaṃ bālyaṃ asampajaññaṃ moho pamoho sammoho avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ avijjālaṅgī moho akusalamūlaṃ.
cnd23:218.6: Tassa paccekasambuddhassa makkho ca kasāvo ca moho ca vantā saṃvantā niddhantā pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭippassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāti.
cnd23:219.2: Yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ.
cnd23:219.3: **Sabbaloke**ti sabbaapāyaloke sabbamanussaloke sabbadevaloke sabbakhandhaloke sabbadhātuloke sabbaāyatanaloke.
cnd23:219.4: **Nirāsaso sabbaloke bhavitvā**ti sabbaloke nirāsaso bhavitvā nittaṇho bhavitvā nippipāso bhavitvāti—
cnd23:219.5: nirāsaso sabbaloke bhavitvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
cnd23:222.2: Pāpasahāyo vuccati yo so sahāyo dasavatthukāya micchādiṭṭhiyā samannāgato—
cnd23:222.3: natthi dinnaṃ, natthi yiṭṭhaṃ, natthi hutaṃ, natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko, natthi ayaṃ loko, natthi paro loko, natthi mātā, natthi pitā, natthi sattā opapātikā, natthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sammaggatā sammāpaṭipannā ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentīti.
cnd23:223.1: **Anatthadassiṃ visame niviṭṭhan**ti anatthadassī vuccati yo so sahāyo dasavatthukāya micchādiṭṭhiyā samannāgato—
cnd23:223.2: natthi dinnaṃ, natthi yiṭṭhaṃ …pe… ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentīti.
cnd23:223.3: **Visame niviṭṭhan**ti visame kāyakamme niviṭṭhaṃ, visame vacīkamme niviṭṭhaṃ, visame manokamme niviṭṭhaṃ, visame pāṇātipāte niviṭṭhaṃ, visame adinnādāne niviṭṭhaṃ, visame kāmesumicchācāre niviṭṭhaṃ, visame musāvāde niviṭṭhaṃ, visamāya pisuṇāya vācāya niviṭṭhaṃ, visamāya pharusāya vācāya niviṭṭhaṃ, visame samphappalāpe niviṭṭhaṃ, visamāya abhijjhāya niviṭṭhaṃ, visame byāpāde niviṭṭhaṃ, visamāya micchādiṭṭhiyā niviṭṭhaṃ, visamesu saṅkhāresu niviṭṭhaṃ visamesu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu niviṭṭhaṃ, visamesu pañcasu nīvaraṇesu niviṭṭhaṃ viniviṭṭhaṃ sattaṃ allīnaṃ upagataṃ ajjhositaṃ adhimuttanti—
cnd23:224.2: **Pasutan**ti yopi kāme esati gavesati pariyesati taccarito tabbahulo taggaruko tanninno tappoṇo tappabbhāro tadadhimutto tadadhipateyyo, sopi kāmappasuto.
cnd23:224.7: phoṭṭhabbe pariyesati taccarito tabbahulo taggaruko tanninno tappoṇo tappabbhāro tadadhimutto tadadhipateyyo, sopi kāmappasuto.
cnd23:224.12: phoṭṭhabbe paṭilabhati taccarito tabbahulo taggaruko tanninno tappoṇo tappabbhāro tadadhimutto tadadhipateyyo, sopi kāmappasuto.
cnd23:224.17: phoṭṭhabbe paribhuñjati taccarito tabbahulo taggaruko tanninno tappoṇo tappabbhāro tadadhimutto tadadhipateyyo, sopi kāmappasuto.
cnd23:224.18: Yathā kalahakārako kalahappasuto, kammakārako kammappasuto, gocare caranto gocarappasuto, jhāyī jhānappasuto;
cnd23:224.19: evameva yo kāme esati gavesati pariyesati taccarito tabbahulo taggaruko tanninno tappoṇo tappabbhāro tadadhimutto tadadhipateyyo, sopi kāmappasuto.

cnd23:272.4: rasā bhikkhuṃ adhibhaṃsu, na bhikkhu rase adhibhosi;
cnd23:272.5: phoṭṭhabbā bhikkhuṃ adhibhaṃsu, na bhikkhu phoṭṭhabbe adhibhosi;
cnd23:272.6: dhammā bhikkhuṃ adhibhaṃsu, na bhikkhu dhamme adhibhosi.
cnd23:272.7: Ayaṃ vuccatāvuso, bhikkhu rūpādhibhūto saddādhibhūto gandhādhibhūto rasādhibhūto phoṭṭhabbādhibhūto dhammādhibhūto adhibhū anadhibhūto adhibhaṃsu naṃ pāpakā akusalā dhammā saṃkilesikā ponobhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇiyā.
cnd23:273.2: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā piyarūpe rūpe nādhimuccati, appiyarūpe rūpe na byāpajjati, upaṭṭhitakāyassati ca viharati appamāṇacetaso.
cnd23:273.3: Tañca cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, yatthassa te uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti;
cnd23:273.5: manasā dhammaṃ viññāya piyarūpe dhamme nādhimuccati, appiyarūpe dhamme na byāpajjati, upaṭṭhitakāyassati ca viharati appamāṇacetaso.
cnd23:273.6: Tañca cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, yatthassa te uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.
cnd23:273.7: Ayaṃ vuccatāvuso, bhikkhu anavassuto cakkhuviññeyyesu rūpesu …pe…
cnd23:273.9: Evaṃvihāriñcāvuso, bhikkhuṃ cakkhuto cepi naṃ māro upasaṅkamati, neva labhetha māro otāraṃ, na labhetha māro ārammaṇaṃ;
cnd23:273.11: manato cepi naṃ māro upasaṅkamati, neva labhetha māro otāraṃ, na labhetha māro ārammaṇaṃ.
cnd23:274.1: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, kūṭāgārā vā kūṭāgārasālā vā bahalamattikā addāvalepanā puratthimāya cepi naṃ disāya puriso ādittāya tiṇukkāya upasaṅkameyya, neva labhetha aggi otāraṃ, na labhetha aggi ārammaṇaṃ;
cnd23:274.7: yato kutoci cepi naṃ puriso ādittāya tiṇukkāya upasaṅkameyya, neva labhetha aggi otāraṃ na labhetha aggi ārammaṇaṃ.
cnd23:274.8: Evameva kho, āvuso, evaṃvihāriṃ bhikkhuṃ cakkhuto cepi naṃ māro upasaṅkamati, neva labhetha māro otāraṃ na labhetha māro ārammaṇaṃ;
cnd23:274.10: manato cepi naṃ māro upasaṅkamati neva labhetha māro otāraṃ na labhetha māro ārammaṇaṃ.

cnd23:275.2: sadde bhikkhu adhibhosi, na saddā bhikkhuṃ adhibhaṃsu;
cnd23:275.3: gandhe bhikkhu adhibhosi, na gandhā bhikkhuṃ adhibhaṃsu;
cnd23:275.4: rase bhikkhu adhibhosi, na rasā bhikkhuṃ adhibhaṃsu;
cnd23:275.5: phoṭṭhabbe bhikkhu adhibhosi, na phoṭṭhabbā bhikkhuṃ adhibhaṃsu;
cnd23:275.6: dhamme bhikkhu adhibhosi, na dhammā bhikkhuṃ adhibhaṃsu.
cnd23:275.7: Ayaṃ vuccatāvuso, bhikkhu rūpādhibhū saddādhibhū gandhādhibhū rasādhibhū phoṭṭhabbādhibhū dhammādhibhū adhibhū anadhibhūto.

cnd23:276.1: **Apariḍayhamāno**ti rāgajena pariḷāhena apariḍayhamāno, dosajena pariḷāhena apariḍayhamāno, mohajena pariḷāhena apariḍayhamānoti—
cnd23:279.1: **Ohārayitvā gihibyañjanānī**ti gihibyañjanāni vuccanti kesā ca massū ca …pe…
cnd23:279.3: **Ohārayitvā gihibyañjanānī**ti gihibyañjanāni oropayitvā samoropayitvā nikkhipitvā paṭippassambhitvāti—
cnd23:280.1: **Sañchannapatto yathā pārichattako**ti yathā so pārichattako koviḷāro bahalapattapalāso sandacchāyo, evameva so paccekasambuddho paripuṇṇapattacīvaradharoti—
cnd23:281.1: **Kāsāyavattho abhinikkhamitvā**ti so paccekasambuddho sabbaṃ gharāvāsapalibodhaṃ chinditvā puttadārapalibodhaṃ chinditvā ñātipalibodhaṃ chinditvā mittāmaccapalibodhaṃ chinditvā sannidhipalibodhaṃ chinditvā kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitvā akiñcanabhāvaṃ upagantvā eko carati viharati iriyati vatteti pāleti yapeti yāpetīti—
cnd23:284.2: **Raso**ti mūlaraso khandharaso tacaraso pattaraso puppharaso phalaraso, ambilaṃ madhuraṃ tittakaṃ kaṭukaṃ loṇikaṃ khārikaṃ lambikaṃ kasāvo sādu asādu sītaṃ uṇhaṃ.
cnd23:284.5: Te ambilaṃ labhitvā anambilaṃ pariyesanti, anambilaṃ labhitvā ambilaṃ pariyesanti;
cnd23:284.6: madhuraṃ labhitvā amadhuraṃ pariyesanti, amadhuraṃ labhitvā madhuraṃ pariyesanti;
cnd23:284.7: tittakaṃ labhitvā atittakaṃ pariyesanti, atittakaṃ labhitvā tittakaṃ pariyesanti;
cnd23:284.8: kaṭukaṃ labhitvā akuṭakaṃ pariyesanti, akuṭakaṃ labhitvā kaṭukaṃ pariyesanti;
cnd23:284.9: loṇikaṃ labhitvā aloṇikaṃ pariyesanti, aloṇikaṃ labhitvā loṇikaṃ pariyesanti;
cnd23:284.10: khārikaṃ labhitvā akhārikaṃ pariyesanti, akhārikaṃ labhitvā khārikaṃ pariyesanti;
cnd23:284.11: kasāvaṃ labhitvā akasāvaṃ pariyesanti, akasāvaṃ labhitvā kasāvaṃ pariyesanti;
cnd23:284.12: lambikaṃ labhitvā alambikaṃ pariyesanti, alambikaṃ labhitvā lambikaṃ pariyesanti;
cnd23:284.13: sāduṃ labhitvā asāduṃ pariyesanti, asāduṃ labhitvā sāduṃ pariyesanti;
cnd23:284.14: sītaṃ labhitvā uṇhaṃ pariyesanti, uṇhaṃ labhitvā sītaṃ pariyesanti.
cnd23:284.15: Te yaṃ yaṃ labhanti tena tena na tussanti, aparāparaṃ pariyesanti.
cnd23:284.16: Manāpikesu rasesu rattā giddhā gathitā mucchitā ajjhosannā laggā laggitā palibuddhā.
cnd23:284.17: Sā rasataṇhā tassa paccekasambuddhassa pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
cnd23:284.18: Tasmā so paccekasambuddho paṭisaṅkhā yoniso āhāraṃ āhāreti—
cnd23:284.19: “neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya;
cnd23:284.20: yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā yāpanāya vihiṃsūparatiyā brahmacariyānuggahāya.
cnd23:284.21: Iti purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmi, navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmi, yātrā ca me bhavissati anavajjatā ca phāsuvihāro cā”ti.
cnd23:285.1: Yathā vaṇaṃ ālimpeyya yāvadeva āruhaṇatthāya, yathā vā akkhaṃ abbhañjeyya yāvadeva bhārassa nittharaṇatthāya, yathā puttamaṃsaṃ āhāraṃ āhareyya yāvadeva kantārassa nittharaṇatthāya;
cnd23:285.2: evameva so paccekasambuddho paṭisaṅkhā yoniso āhāraṃ āhāreti—
cnd23:285.3: “neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya;
cnd23:285.4: yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā yāpanāya vihiṃsūparatiyā brahmacariyānuggahāya.
cnd23:285.5: Iti purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmi, navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmi, yātrā ca me bhavissati anavajjatā ca phāsuvihāro cā”ti.
cnd23:285.6: Rasataṇhāya ārato virato paṭivirato nikkhanto nissaṭo vippamutto visaññutto vimariyādikatena cetasā viharatīti—
cnd23:286.2: Yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ.
cnd23:286.3: Sā loluppā taṇhā tassa paccekasambuddhassa pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
cnd23:287.2: **anaññaposī**ti so paccekasambuddho attānaññeva poseti, na paranti.
cnd23:289.1: **Anaññaposī sapadānacārī**ti so paccekasambuddho pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisati rakkhiteneva kāyena rakkhitāya vācāya rakkhitena cittena upaṭṭhitāya satiyā saṃvutehi indriyehi.
cnd23:289.2: Okkhittacakkhu iriyāpathasampanno kulā kulaṃ anatikkamanto piṇḍāya caratīti—
cnd23:290.1: **Kule kule appaṭibaddhacitto**ti dvīhi kāraṇehi paṭibaddhacitto hoti—
cnd23:290.2: attānaṃ vā nīcaṃ ṭhapento paraṃ uccaṃ ṭhapento paṭibaddhacitto hoti, attānaṃ vā uccaṃ ṭhapento paraṃ nīcaṃ ṭhapento paṭibaddhacitto hoti.
cnd23:290.3: Kathaṃ attānaṃ nīcaṃ ṭhapento paraṃ uccaṃ ṭhapento paṭibaddhacitto hoti?
cnd23:290.4: “Tumhe me bahūpakārā, ahaṃ tumhe nissāya labhāmi cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ.
cnd23:290.5: Yampi me aññe dātuṃ vā kātuṃ vā maññanti tumhe nissāya tumhe passantā.
cnd23:290.6: Yampi me porāṇaṃ mātāpettikaṃ nāmagottaṃ tampi me antarahitaṃ tumhehi ahaṃ ñāyāmi—
cnd23:290.8: Evaṃ attānaṃ nīcaṃ ṭhapento paraṃ uccaṃ ṭhapento paṭibaddhacitto hoti.
cnd23:291.1: Kathaṃ attānaṃ uccaṃ ṭhapento paraṃ nīcaṃ ṭhapento paṭibaddhacitto hoti?
cnd23:291.2: “Ahaṃ tumhākaṃ bahūpakāro, tumhe maṃ āgamma buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā saṃghaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā, pāṇātipātā paṭiviratā, adinnādānā paṭiviratā, kāmesumicchācārā paṭiviratā, musāvādā paṭiviratā, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭiviratā, tumhākaṃ ahaṃ uddesaṃ demi paripucchaṃ demi uposathaṃ ācikkhāmi navakammaṃ adhiṭṭhāmi;
cnd23:291.3: atha ca pana tumhe maṃ ujjhitvā aññe sakkarotha garuṃ karotha mānetha pūjethā”ti.
cnd23:291.4: Evaṃ attānaṃ uccaṃ ṭhapento paraṃ nīcaṃ ṭhapento paṭibaddhacitto hoti.
cnd23:292.1: **Kule kule appaṭibaddhacitto**ti so paccekasambuddho kulapalibodhena appaṭibaddhacitto hoti, gaṇapalibodhena appaṭibaddhacitto hoti, āvāsapalibodhena appaṭibaddhacitto hoti, cīvarapalibodhena appaṭibaddhacitto hoti, piṇḍapātapalibodhena appaṭibaddhacitto hoti, senāsanapalibodhena appaṭibaddhacitto hoti, gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārapalibodhena appaṭibaddhacitto hotīti—
cnd23:292.2: kule kule appaṭibaddhacitto hoti, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
cnd23:295.1: **Pahāya pañcāvaraṇāni cetaso**ti so paccekasambuddho kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ pahāya pajahitvā vinodetvā byantīkaritvā anabhāvaṃ gametvā, byāpādanīvaraṇaṃ …
cnd23:295.4: vicikicchānīvaraṇaṃ pahāya pajahitvā vinodetvā byantīkaritvā anabhāvaṃ gametvā vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatīti—
cnd23:296.1: **Upakkilese byapanujja sabbe**ti rāgo cittassa upakkileso, doso cittassa upakkileso, moho cittassa upakkileso, kodho … upanāho …pe… sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārā cittassa upakkilesā.
cnd23:296.2: **Upakkilese byapanujja sabbe**ti sabbe cittassa upakkilese byapanujja panuditvā pajahitvā vinodetvā byantīkaritvā anabhāvaṃ gametvāti—
cnd23:297.10: **Doso**ti yo cittassa āghāto paṭighāto paṭighaṃ paṭivirodho kopo pakopo sampakopo doso padoso sampadoso cittassa byāpatti manopadoso kodho kujjhanā kujjhitattaṃ doso dussanā dussitattaṃ byāpatti byāpajjanā byāpajjitattaṃ caṇḍikkaṃ asuropo anattamanatā cittassa.
cnd23:297.11: **Anissito chetva sinehadosan**ti so paccekasambuddho taṇhāsnehañca diṭṭhisnehañca dosañca chetvā ucchinditvā samucchinditvā pajahitvā vinodetvā byantīkaritvā anabhāvaṃ gametvā cakkhuṃ anissito,
cnd23:297.13: diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbe dhamme anissito anallīno anupagato anajjhosito anadhimutto nikkhanto nissaṭo vippamutto visaññutto vimariyādikatena cetasā viharatīti—
cnd23:297.14: anissito chetva sinehadosaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
cnd23:300.1: **Vipiṭṭhikatvāna sukhaṃ dukhañca, pubbeva ca somanassadomanassan**ti so paccekasambuddho sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatīti—
cnd23:300.2: vipiṭṭhikatvāna sukhaṃ dukhañca, pubbeva ca somanassadomanassaṃ.
cnd23:301.2: **Upekkhā**ti yā catutthajjhāne upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā cittasamatā cittappassaddhatā majjhattatā cittassa.
cnd23:301.3: **Samatho**ti yā cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṃ samādhibalaṃ sammāsamādhi;
cnd23:301.4: catutthajjhāne upekkhā ca samatho ca suddhā honti visuddhā pariyodātā anaṅgaṇā vigatūpakkilesā mudubhūtā kammaniyā ṭhitā āneñjappattā.
cnd23:301.5: **Laddhānupekkhaṃ samathaṃ visuddhan**ti catutthajjhānaṃ upekkhañca samathañca laddhā labhitvā vinditvā paṭilabhitvāti—
cnd23:301.6: laddhānupekkhaṃ samathaṃ visuddhaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
cnd23:304.2: Yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ.
cnd23:304.3: Paramatthassa pattiyā lābhāya paṭilābhāya adhigamāya phassanāya sacchikiriyāya āraddhavīriyo viharati akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ sampadāya thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesūti—
cnd23:305.1: **Alīnacitto akusītavuttī**ti so paccekasambuddho anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati, uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya …pe…
cnd23:305.3: uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahatīti—
cnd23:306.1: Atha vā “kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu, sarīre upassussatu maṃsalohitaṃ, yaṃ taṃ purisathāmena purisabalena purisavīriyena purisaparakkamena pattabbaṃ na taṃ apāpuṇitvā vīriyassa saṇṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati.
cnd23:309.1: “Na tāvāhaṃ imaṃ pallaṅkaṃ bhindissāmi yāva me na anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccissatī”ti cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati.
cnd23:310.1: “Na tāvāhaṃ imamhā āsanā vuṭṭhahissāmi yāva me na anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccissatī”ti cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati.
cnd23:311.15: rukkhamūlā nikkhamissāmi yāva me na anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccissatī”ti cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati.
cnd23:312.1: “Imasmiṃyeva pubbaṇhasamaye ariyadhammaṃ āharissāmi samāharissāmi adhigacchissāmi phassayissāmi sacchikarissāmī”ti cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati.
cnd23:312.17: pacchime vayokhandhe ariyadhammaṃ āharissāmi samāharissāmi adhigacchissāmi phassayissāmi sacchikarissāmī”ti cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati.
cnd23:313.1: **Daḷhanikkamo thāmabalūpapanno**ti so paccekasambuddho daḷhasamādāno ahosi kusalesu dhammesu avaṭṭhitasamādāno kāyasucarite vacīsucarite manosucarite dānasaṃvibhāge sīlasamādāne uposathupavāse matteyyatāya petteyyatāya sāmaññatāya brahmaññatāya kulejeṭṭhāpacāyitāya aññataraññataresu adhikusalesu dhammesūti—
cnd23:313.3: **Thāmabalūpapanno**ti so paccekasambuddho thāmena ca balena ca vīriyena ca parakkamena ca paññāya ca upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno samupapanno samannāgatoti—
cnd23:316.1: **Paṭisallānaṃ jhānamariñcamāno**ti so paccekasambuddho paṭisallānārāmo hoti paṭisallānarato ajjhattaṃ cetosamathamanuyutto anirākatajjhāno vipassanāya samannāgato brūhetā suññāgāraṃ jhāyī jhānarato ekattamanuyutto sadatthagarukoti paṭisallānaṃ.
cnd23:316.2: **Jhānamariñcamāno**ti so paccekasambuddho dvīhi kāraṇehi jhānaṃ na riñcati—
cnd23:316.3: anuppannassa vā paṭhamassa jhānassa uppādāya yutto payutto saṃyutto āyutto samāyutto, anuppannassa vā dutiyassa jhānassa …pe…
cnd23:316.5: anuppannassa vā catutthassa jhānassa uppādāya yutto payutto saṃyutto āyutto samāyuttoti—
cnd23:317.1: Atha vā uppannaṃ vā paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti, uppannaṃ vā dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ …pe…
cnd23:317.3: uppannaṃ vā catutthaṃ jhānaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
cnd23:318.1: **Dhammesu niccaṃ anudhammacārī**ti dhammā vuccanti cattāro satipaṭṭhānā …pe…
cnd23:318.4: Sammāpaṭipadā apaccanīkapaṭipadā anvatthapaṭipadā dhammānudhammapaṭipadā sīlesu paripūrakāritā indriyesu guttadvāratā bhojane mattaññutā jāgariyānuyogo satisampajaññaṃ—
cnd23:318.6: **Dhammesu niccaṃ anudhammacārī**ti dhammesu niccakālaṃ dhuvakālaṃ satataṃ samitaṃ avokiṇṇaṃ poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ udakūmikajātaṃ
cnd23:319.1: Avīcisantatisahitaṃ phassitaṃ purebhattaṃ pacchābhattaṃ purimayāmaṃ majjhimayāmaṃ pacchimayāmaṃ kāḷe juṇhe vasse hemante gimhe purime vayokhandhe majjhime vayokhandhe pacchime vayokhandhe carati viharati iriyati vatteti pāleti yapeti yāpetīti—
cnd23:320.1: **Ādīnavaṃ sammasitā bhavesū**ti “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti ādīnavaṃ sammasitā bhavesu,
cnd23:320.4: “yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman”ti ādīnavaṃ sammasitā bhavesūti—
cnd23:320.5: ādīnavaṃ sammasitā bhavesu, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
cnd23:323.3: **Taṇhakkhayan**ti rāgakkhayaṃ dosakkhayaṃ mohakkhayaṃ gatikkhayaṃ upapattikkhayaṃ paṭisandhikkhayaṃ bhavakkhayaṃ saṃsārakkhayaṃ vaṭṭakkhayaṃ patthayanto icchanto sādiyanto pihayanto abhijappantoti—
cnd23:323.5: **Appamatto**ti so paccekasambuddho sakkaccakārī sātaccakārī …pe… appamādo kusalesu dhammesūti—
cnd23:324.2: **Aneḷamūgo**ti so paccekasambuddho paṇḍito paññavā buddhimā ñāṇī vibhāvī medhāvī.
cnd23:324.3: **Sutavā**ti so paccekasambuddho bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo.
cnd23:324.4: Ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ abhivadanti, tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
cnd23:324.5: **Satīmā**ti so paccekasambuddho satimā hoti paramena satinepakkena samannāgatattā cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi saritā anussaritāti—
cnd23:325.2: Yā paññā pajānanā …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi.
cnd23:325.3: **Saṅkhātadhammo**ti so paccekasambuddho saṅkhātadhammo ñātadhammo tulitadhammo tīritadhammo vibhūtadhammo vibhāvitadhammo “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti saṅkhātadhammo …pe…
cnd23:325.4: “yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman”ti saṅkhātadhammo ñātadhammo tulitadhammo tīritadhammo vibhūtadhammo vibhāvitadhammo.
cnd23:325.5: Atha vā tassa paccekasambuddhassa ca khandhā saṃkhittā dhātuyo saṃkhittā āyatanāni saṃkhittāni gatiyo saṃkhittā upapattiyo saṃkhittā paṭisandhiyo saṃkhittā bhavā saṃkhittā saṃsārā saṃkhittā vaṭṭā saṃkhittā.
cnd23:325.6: Atha vā so paccekasambuddho khandhapariyante ṭhito dhātupariyante ṭhito āyatanapariyante ṭhito gatipariyante ṭhito upapattipariyante ṭhito paṭisandhipariyante ṭhito bhavapariyante ṭhito saṃsārapariyante ṭhito vaṭṭapariyante ṭhito saṅkhārapariyante ṭhito antimabhave ṭhito antimasamussaye ṭhito antimadehadharo paccekasambuddho.
cnd23:327.4: Niyāmaṃ patto sampatto adhigato phassito sacchikato patto niyāmaṃ.
cnd23:327.6: So cetaso vīriyārambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyāmo vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo dhiti asithilaparakkamo anikkhittacchandatā anikkhittadhuratā dhurasampaggāho vīriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ vīriyabalaṃ sammāvāyāmo.
cnd23:327.7: So paccekasambuddho iminā padhānena upeto samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno samupapanno samannāgato.
cnd23:327.9: saṅkhātadhammo niyato padhānavā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
cnd23:330.1: **Sīhova saddesu asantasanto**ti yathā sīho migarājā saddesu asantāsī aparisantāsī anutrāsī anubbiggo anussaṅkī anutrāso abhīrū acchambhī anutrāsī apalāyī, paccekasambuddhopi saddesu asantāsī aparisantāsī anutrāsī anubbiggo anussaṅkī anutrāso abhīrū acchambhī anutrāsī apalāyī pahīnabhayabheravo vigatalomahaṃso viharatīti—
cnd23:331.2: **Vāto**ti puratthimā vātā pacchimā vātā uttarā vātā dakkhiṇā vātā sarajā vātā arajā vātā sītā vātā uṇhā vātā parittā vātā adhimattā vātā verambhavātā pakkhavātā supaṇṇavātā tālapaṇṇavātā vidhūpanavātā.
cnd23:331.4: Yathā vāto jālamhi na sajjati na gaṇhāti na bajjhati na palibajjhati, evameva dve jālā—
cnd23:331.8: Tassa paccekasambuddhassa taṇhājālaṃ pahīnaṃ diṭṭhijālaṃ paṭinissaṭṭhaṃ, taṇhājālassa pahīnattā diṭṭhijālassa paṭinissaṭṭhattā so paccekasambuddho rūpe na sajjati sadde na sajjati …pe…
cnd23:331.9: diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbesu dhammesu na sajjati na gaṇhāti na bajjhati na palibajjhati nikkhanto nissaṭo vippamutto visaññutto vimariyādikatena cetasā viharatīti—
cnd23:332.3: Yathā padumapupphaṃ toyena na limpati na palimpati na upalimpati, alittaṃ apalittaṃ anupalittaṃ, evameva dve lepā—
cnd23:332.7: Tassa paccekasambuddhassa taṇhālepo pahīno, diṭṭhilepo paṭinissaṭṭho.
cnd23:332.8: Taṇhālepassa pahīnattā diṭṭhilepassa paṭinisaṭṭhattā so paccekasambuddho rūpe na limpati sadde na limpati …pe…
cnd23:332.9: diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbesu dhammesu na limpati na palimpati na upalimpati, alitto apalitto anupalitto nikkhanto nissaṭo vippamutto visaññutto vimariyādikatena cetasā viharatīti—
cnd23:332.10: padumaṃva toyena alimpamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
cnd23:335.1: **Sīho yathā dāṭhabalī pasayha, rājā migānaṃ abhibhuyya cārī**ti yathā sīho migarājā dāṭhabalī dāṭhāvudho sabbe tiracchānagate pāṇe abhibhuyya abhibhavitvā ajjhottharitvā pariyādiyitvā madditvā carati viharati iriyati vatteti pāleti yapeti yāpeti, paccekasambuddhopi paññābalī paññāvudho sabbapāṇabhūte puggale paññāya abhibhuyya abhibhavitvā ajjhottharitvā pariyādiyitvā madditvā carati viharati iriyati vatteti pāleti yapeti yāpetīti—
cnd23:335.2: sīho yathā dāṭhabalī pasayha, rājā migānaṃ abhibhuyya cārī.
cnd23:336.1: **Sevetha pantāni senāsanānī**ti yathā sīho migarājā araññavanamajjhogāhetvā carati viharati iriyati vatteti pāleti yapeti yāpeti, paccekasambuddhopi araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevati appasaddāni appanigghosāni vijanavātāni manussarāhasseyyakāni paṭisallānasāruppāni.
cnd23:336.2: So eko gacchati eko tiṭṭhati eko nisīdati eko seyyaṃ kappeti eko gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati eko paṭikkamati eko raho nisīdati eko caṅkamaṃ adhiṭṭhāti eko carati viharati iriyati vatteti pāleti yapeti yāpetīti—
cnd23:336.3: sevetha pantāni senāsanāni, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
cnd23:339.1: **Mettaṃ upekkhaṃ karuṇaṃ vimuttiṃ, āsevamāno muditañca kāle**ti so paccekasambuddho mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati tathā dutiyaṃ … tathā tatiyaṃ … tathā catutthaṃ … iti uddhamadho tiriyaṃ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati;
cnd23:339.4: upekkhāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharatīti—
cnd23:339.5: mettaṃ upekkhaṃ karuṇaṃ vimuttiṃ, āsevamāno muditañca kāle.
cnd23:340.1: **Sabbena lokena avirujjhamāno**ti mettāya bhāvitattā ye puratthimāya disāya sattā te appaṭikūlā honti, ye pacchimāya disāya sattā …pe…
cnd23:340.10: ye dasasu disāsu sattā te appaṭikūlā honti.
cnd23:340.13: upekkhāya bhāvitattā ye puratthimāya disāya sattā …pe…
cnd23:340.14: ye dasasu disāsu sattā te appaṭikūlā honti.
cnd23:340.15: **Sabbena lokena avirujjhamāno**ti sabbena lokena avirujjhamāno, appaṭivirujjhamāno anāghātiyamāno appaṭihaññamānoti—
cnd23:340.16: sabbena lokena avirujjhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
cnd23:343.2: **Rāgo**ti yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ.
cnd23:343.3: **Doso**ti yo cittassa āghāto …pe… caṇḍikkaṃ asuropo anattamanatā cittassa.
cnd23:343.5: **Rāgañca dosañca pahāya mohan**ti so paccekasambuddho rāgañca dosañca mohañca pahāya pajahitvā vinodetvā byantīkaritvā anabhāvaṃ gametvāti—
cnd23:344.4: **Sandālayitvāna saṃyojanānī**ti dasa saṃyojanāni sandālayitvā padālayitvā sampadālayitvā pajahitvā vinodetvā byantīkaritvā anabhāvaṃ gametvāti—
cnd23:345.1: **Asantasaṃ jīvitasaṅkhayamhī**ti so paccekasambuddho jīvitapariyosāne asantāsī anutrāsī anubbiggo anussaṅkī anutrāso abhīrū acchambhī anutrāsī apalāyī pahīnabhayabheravo vigatalomahaṃso viharatīti—
cnd23:348.1: **Bhajanti sevanti ca kāraṇatthā**ti attatthakāraṇā paratthakāraṇā ubhayatthakāraṇā diṭṭhadhammikatthakāraṇā samparāyikatthakāraṇā paramatthakāraṇā bhajanti sambhajanti sevanti nisevanti saṃsevanti paṭisevantīti—
cnd23:349.5: **Nikkāraṇā dullabhā ajja mittā**ti ime dve mittā akāraṇā nikkāraṇā ahetū appaccayā dullabhā dulladdhā sudulladdhā ti—
cnd23:350.2: **Attatthapaññā**ti attano atthāya attano hetu attano paccayā attano kāraṇā bhajanti sambhajanti sevanti nisevanti saṃsevanti paṭisevanti ācaranti samācaranti payirupāsanti paripucchanti paripañhantīti—
cnd23:350.4: **Asucī manussā**ti asucinā kāyakammena samannāgatāti asucī manussā, asucinā vacīkammena samannāgatāti asucī manussā, asucinā manokammena samannāgatāti asucī manussā, asucinā pāṇātipātena …pe…
cnd23:350.12: asucinā byāpādena samannāgatāti asucī manussā, asuciyā micchādiṭṭhiyā samannāgatāti asucī manussā, asuciyā cetanāya samannāgatāti asucī manussā, asuciyā patthanāya samannāgatāti asucī manussā, asucinā paṇidhinā samannāgatāti asucī manussā, asucī hīnā nihīnā omakā lāmakā chatukkā parittāti—
cnd23:351.4: **khaggavisāṇakappo**ti yathā khaggassa nāma visāṇaṃ ekaṃ hoti adutiyaṃ …pe…
